# Accessibility Review of nature.ca
## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 23-125-RFP
* **Publication Date**: January 19, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 16, 2024, 4:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Number**: 1, dated February 16, 2024

## Project Overview

The Canadian Museum of Nature invites experienced and qualified firms to submit a proposal to conduct an accessibility review of nature.ca, including meaningful consultation with persons with disabilities. The proposal will be evaluated based on the Scope of Work (SOW) outlined in the instructions.

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria will be based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

## Tender Procedure

To participate, interested vendors must first register on the [Bonfire](https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca) website and create an online profile. All bid submissions and registration are free of charge. Technical help is available by calling 1-800-354-8010, ext. 2, or submitting a request on the Bonfire website.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Michelle Garber
Procurement and Contracts
Canadian Museum of Nature
PO Box 3443, Station D, Ottawa, ON K1N 6P4
Phone: (613) 566-4240
Email: [procurement@nature.ca](mailto:procurement@nature.ca)

Note that all bidders are required to submit their bids electronically via the Bonfire website. No hard copies will be accepted. The tender documents on the Bonfire website are the official source of information on all bids for the Canadian Museum of Nature. Bidders are cautioned against relying on documents obtained from other sources. [1]

References:
[1] Only the official Bonfire website (https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca) provides the most current information about this solicitation. The museum is not responsible for information obtained from other sources.
